mapper.select: SELECT R.RSV_SEQ , RU.APPL_YN , RU.USE_ID , E.EMP_NAME , E.EMAIL , T.TEAM_NAME FROM nkep_11.TB_RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_RSV_DETAIL RU ON R.RSV_SEQ = RU.RSV_SEQ LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_EMPLOYEE E ON RU.USE_ID = E.EMP_ID LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_TEAM T ON E.TEAM_SEQ = T.TEAM_SEQ WHERE R.RSV_SEQ = #{rsvSeq}

SELECT R.RSV_SEQ , I.ITEM_NAME , IR.ITEM_CNT FROM nkep_11.TB_RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_RSV_ITEM IR ON R.RSV_SEQ = IR.RSV_SEQ LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_ITEM I ON IR.ITEM_CODE = I.ITEM_CODE WHERE R.RSV_SEQ = #{rsvSeq}

SELECT R.RSV_SEQ , C.MGR_YN , IF(R.ROOM_TYPE = 'E', CONCAT(WE.WORK_NAME,'-',ED.EDU_NAME), CONCAT(WM.WORK_NAME,'-',MT.MT_NAME)) AS ROOM_NAME , R.RSV_PRICE , R.APPLICANT FROM nkep_11.TB_RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_CONFIRM C ON R.RSV_SEQ = C.RSV_SEQ LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_MT_ROOM MT ON R.ROOM_SEQ = MT.MT_CODE LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_EDU_ROOM ED ON R.ROOM_SEQ = ED.EDU_CODE LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_WORKSPACE WM ON MT.WORK_CODE = WM.WORK_CODE LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_WORKSPACE WE ON ED.WORK_CODE = WE.WORK_CODE WHERE R.RSV_SEQ IN (SELECT R.RSV_SEQ FROM nkep_11.TB_RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_RSV_DETAIL RU ON R.RSV_SEQ = RU.RSV_SEQ WHERE RU.USE_ID = #{empId})

SELECT R.RSV_SEQ , C.CON_SEQ , C.BOSS_YN , C.MGR_YN , IF(R.RSV_TYPE = 'L', DATE_FORMAT(R.RSV_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d'),DATE_FORMAT(R.RSV_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i')) AS RSV_DATE , IF(R.RSV_TYPE = 'L', DATE_FORMAT(R.RSV_FDATE, '%Y/%m/%d'),DATE_FORMAT(R.RSV_FDATE, '%H:%i')) AS RSV_FDATE , IF(R.ROOM_TYPE = 'E', CONCAT(WE.WORK_NAME,'-',ED.EDU_NAME), CONCAT(WM.WORK_NAME,'-',MT.MT_NAME)) AS ROOM_NAME , R.RSV_PRICE , R.APPLICANT , C.REJECT FROM nkep_11.TB_RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_CONFIRM C ON R.RSV_SEQ = C.RSV_SEQ LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_MT_ROOM MT ON R.ROOM_SEQ = MT.MT_CODE LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_EDU_ROOM ED ON R.ROOM_SEQ = ED.EDU_CODE LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_WORKSPACE WM ON MT.WORK_CODE = WM.WORK_CODE LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_WORKSPACE WE ON ED.WORK_CODE = WE.WORK_CODE WHERE R.RSV_SEQ = #{rsvSeq}

SELECT I.ITEM_NAME , I.ITEM_UNIT , I.ITEM_TYPE , I.ITEM_SEQ FROM nkep_11.TB_STOCK S LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_ITEM I ON S.ITEM_SEQ = I.ITEM_SEQ WHERE S.WORK_SEQ = #{workSeq} AND S.ST_CNT > 0 ORDER BY I.ITEM_TYPE
